company: University of Waterloo Petroleum Energy Association
caption: Organized and marketing talks, meet and greets and other events on campus leading to 100+ membership and regular turn out

Got promoted from a technical member to the team lead for the macrofabrication (mechanical) work necessary for the group. I lead a team of three students to design and build the control system which won ICRA 2013 mobile robotics competition
Collaborated with UWES and UWPEA to promote entrepreneurship in the petroleum and energy industry
Taught classes in leadership and lifesaving techniques in an aquatics environment
Leadership and instructional training from the Royal Canadian Army Cadets
Founded the local Columbian squires circle eventually got knighted when I turned 18
